name: Stronger Together (Zyppi)
description:
IF YOU DONT SEE YOUR  CURSOR AT THE BEGINNING TRY PRESSING RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON AND TRY TO MOVE CURSOR TO THE BOTTOM OF THE PLAY SCREEN. THEN RELEASE IT. THE CURSOR SHOULD APPEAR.

 AFTER COMPLITING  THE FIRST  LEVEL WITH PLIERS THE DEMO ENDS AND FINAL STORY SHOULD APPEAR , BUT BECAUSE OF BUG IT WILL NOT.

THIS IS THE FINAL STORY. 

"This is the last place where i can come by myself. Now I need my friends help.

Wait what is the strange sound? They are coming for us...

Thank you for helping us to come here. Our friends would never found us without your help."

  

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Movement - WASD or Arrows

Jump - W or Space or UpArrow

Restart Chapter - R  

Tools Choosing -  Right mouse button

Tools Usage - Click on place where you want to use the tool with Left Mouse Button

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
